feature_short_description: Scan and process invoices directly from email attachments
feature_description:
## Email Scanning

Email Scanning allows your organization to automatically receive, process, and extract invoice data from incoming emails.

### Capabilities
- Automatic email-to-invoice processing
- Support for common attachment formats (PDF, JPEG, PNG)
- Automatic sender whitelisting and filtering
- Batch email processing
- Integration with standard email protocols (IMAP)

### Use Cases
- Automate supplier invoice receipt workflows
- Reduce manual data entry
- Create centralized invoice archive from email
- Implement vendor email forwarding workflows
- Enable non-technical users to submit invoices

### Features
- Multiple email account support
- Configurable forwarding rules
- Automatic duplicate detection
- Email notification on processing completion
- Email audit trail and history

### Limitations
- Email attachments limited to 25MB per file
- Processing queue may have slight delays during peak hours
- Requires active email account configuration

### Setup
Email scanning requires configuration of email accounts with security credentials. Please contact support for assistance with setup.
